text: Accha, ab Allah ne tumhara bojh halka kiya aur usey maloom hua ke abhi tum mein kamzori hai. Pas agar tum mein se saw (hundred) aadmi saabir hon to woh do saw (two hundred) par aur hazaar aadmi aisey hon to do hazaar par Allah ke hukum se gaalib aayenge. Aur Allah un logon ke saath hai jo sabr karne waley hain
